009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
012import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
013
014/**
015 * Common interface for Nagao-Matsuyama filter implementations.
016 * 
017 * @author WB
018 */
019public interface NagaoMatsuyamaF {
020        
021        /**
022         * Parameter bundle for Nagao-Matsuyama filters (implementations of {@link NagaoMatsuyamaF}).
023         */
024        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<NagaoMatsuyamaF> {
025
026                @DialogLabel("Variance threshold (0,..,10)")
027                public double varThreshold = 0.0;
028
029        }
030        
031        abstract class Constants {
032                protected static final int[][] R0 =
033                        {{-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
034                         {-1, 0}, {0, 0}, {1, 0},
035                         {-1, 1}, {0, 1}, {1, 1}};
036                        
037                protected static final int[][] R1 =
038                        {{-2,-1}, {-1,-1},
039                         {-2, 0}, {-1, 0}, {0, 0},
040                         {-2, 1}, {-1, 1}};
041                        
042                protected static final int[][] R2 =
043                        {{-2,-2}, {-1,-2},
044                         {-2,-1}, {-1,-1}, {0,-1},
045                                  {-1, 0}, {0, 0}};
046                        
047                protected static final int[][] R3 =
048                        {{-1,-2}, {0,-2}, {1,-2}, 
049                         {-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
050                                  {0, 0}};
051
052                protected static final int[][] R4 =
053                        {        {1,-2}, {2,-2},
054                         {0,-1}, {1,-1}, {2,-1},
055                         {0, 0}, {1, 0}};
056                        
057                protected static final int[][] R5 =
058                        {        {1,-1}, {2,-1},
059                         {0, 0}, {1, 0}, {2, 0},
060                                 {1, 1}, {2, 1}};
061                        
062                protected static final int[][] R6 =
063                        {{0,0}, {1,0},
064                         {0,1}, {1,1}, {2,1},
065                                {1,2}, {2,2}};
066
067                protected static final int[][] R7 =
068                        {        {0,0},
069                         {-1,1}, {0,1}, {1,1},
070                         {-1,2}, {0,2}, {1,2}};
071                        
072                protected static final int[][] R8 =
073                        {        {-1,0}, {0,0},
074                         {-2,1}, {-1,1}, {0,1},
075                         {-2,2}, {-1,2}};
076                        
077                protected static final int[][][] SubRegions = {R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, R8};
078        }
079        
080}
